docs.summary: The Lottie element is used for embedding and customizing a Lottie animation.
description: [Lottie](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-and-setting-up-ellipsis-text) allows you to embed and customize your [Lottie](https://airbnb.design/lottie/) animation.
After adding the Lottie component to your site, change the `src` of the Lottie element to
an external Lottie animation URL from any web location, for example, `'https://assets6.lottiefiles.com/private_files/lf30_vuxs5lpt.json'`, or to
a valid Lottie JSON file imported to your page code.

Your Lottie JSON file should look something [like this](https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-web/blob/master/docs/json/animation.json). For the Lottie JSON file to be valid, the file must include the following properties and types:

### To import the valid Lottie JSON file to your page code, create a new public js file to hold your valid Lottie JSON code. Then export the function from your public file and import it in your page code.
